value:
Sunrises are just as beautiful in this
world as my own. Bathing in the light
refreshes the spirit.

Archanea saw continuous wars
that spread a dreary sadness
across the land...$k$pI hope this world, too, can escape
that fate.

You need not worry yourself over me.
I may not look it, but I've seen more
than my share of war.

Even after his ascension, I still pour
tea for Marth. It's a task I have
difficulty letting anyone else enjoy.

If only people could live in harmony
instead of constant competition
against one another...$k$pThat is the kind of world I dream of.

You have a lovely castle. Praises
from $Nf!

To return to a more peaceful age,
we must recognize that fighting
creates only strife...

As you offer me no choice,
I will not give up.
What's come over me?

Oh my! Thank you so much. I will do
my best to use it well in your name.

I am Caeda. Lor—excuse me, that is
KING Marth's...queen. I'm still not
used to introducing myself like this...

Is there someone you love?
Someone you would fight and
die for, $Nu?$k$p...Strange, I almost feel as if we've
had a conversation like this before.
But that couldn't have been you...$k$pI'm sorry, where was I? Oh right...
When I met Marth, I wanted to help
and support him however I could.$k$pBut in reality, it was a selfish wish.
I wanted to be near to someone
like him, who made me feel safe.$k$pHe was gentle, noble, and adored by
all—and he believed in me.$k$pSo, I gave everything I am to help
his cause. That is how I gave him
my love.$k$pIf everyone in the world could
be true to one another...think of
what we could accomplish.$k$pThat is why we continue to fight,
even now.$k$pWe'll keep up the fight to create
a better world for as long as it takes!
えいっ
どうです？
ああっ…
いけない…
Love conquers all!
I won't surrender!
I believe!
My condolences...
Too soon for goodbyes...
え？
I never expected to become a Legendary Hero. I'm a little overwhelmed, to be honest.
Ah! Oh, it's you. What are you up to, exactly?
I grew up in a small island kingdom. My horizons have broadened considerably since those days.
So long as people put their trust in me, I must do all I can to succeed.
I truly believe that we are all capable of coming together in mutual love and respect.
I think I've come a little bit closer to understanding how Marth must feel.
As a Hero, I aspire to give hope and comfort to those I protect.
Naturally.
Ooh, that's tough.
Leave it to me.
